resources.string: The current device does not support taking pictures

string-array.name: step1
string-array.item:
Make sure there is no strap attached to the device and no tension is being applied.
Check if current tension is close to zero (mostly is 0-50 lbs). If true, skip this step. If not, click Calibrate Offset button below to zeroize current tension.

string-array.name: step2
string-array.item: Click Read Register Value button to check reference tension. Use a crane scale and strap to apply a stable tension to the device.

string-array.name: step3
string-array.item:
Type in the crane scale reading tension value below, and click Update button to update reference tension.
Go back to Step 2, and click button to check current reference tension.

string-array.name: step4
string-array.item: Check if the current tension is close to (within +/-100 lbs) the reference tension right now. If true, calibration is done. If not, click Calibrate Reference button below.

string-array.name: info1
string-array.item: To perform calibration, please connect to the target device first. Before connection, make sure the applied tension value is below 255 lbs or no tension is being applied on the target device.
